projects.title: About this site
projects.description: This was my first attempt using a 3D javascript library.  I wanted to use only built in shapes and objects, without the use of 3d modeling software.

projects.title: Kinetk Website
projects.description: Making a fully animated 3D portfolio website.  In collaboration with Philadelphia based musicians.  My first few attempts used only built in three.js objects.  But I quickly discovered that in order to get the results we wanted, we need to model the shapes first.

projects.title: What's Your Color?
